My name is Christian Charukiewicz. I am a technology leader, software engineer, functional programming expert, Linux user, teacher, learner, avid reader, and culinary enthusiast. I'm a Co-Founder, Partner, and Principal Software Engineer at Foxhound Systems, a custom software development company that specializes in building fast, reliable, and secure software systems. Read more about me or contact me.
